nodes.text: Warp-top was a high-tech gambling machine played in booths. Traditional warp-tops were horseshoe-shaped, and they were one of the favored games of the hard-core crinbid fanatics. Gamblers could indulge in warp-top at the Ace of Sabres on Kluistar. onboard the Coral Vanda in Pantolomin's oceans, and in the Royal Casino on Bespin's Cloud City.
